content: here s yoshi in his chibi yarn yoshi amigurumi form he loves to swallow up his enemies and turn them into yarn size approximately 7in/18cm tall from head to feet level easy his features include his short little arms spikes on the back of his head his saddleback shell and his cute little booties please enjoy ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i m having a yarn yoshi cal you can join along here http //www ravelry com/discuss/amigurumi-army/3310258/ 1 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/amigurumi-army/3310258/
